text: hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo geubun-ui sado-ege seonsahasin gongmul(gongmul) jeonlipum-eun, geudaedeul-i geugeos(jeonlipum)eul wihayeo mal-ina nagtalo doljinhan jeog-i eobsnola. geuleona hananimkkeseoneun geubun-ui sadodeul-ege geubunkkeseo wonhasineun jaleul sangdaelo tongchigwon-eul buyeohasinola. hananimkkeseoneun modeun geos-i ganeunghan bun-isila
